comment.body:
```
ubiklibri.it#@#.cookie-overlay:not(html):not(body)
ubiklibri.it#@#.cookie-info:not(body):not(html)
ubiklibri.it#@#.cookie-header
ubiklibri.it#@#.cookie-container
```
+
`ubiklibri.it#$##cookie-html { display:none !important; }`
+
`ubiklibri.it#$#html.cookie-no-scroll { overflow: auto !important; }`
or
`ubiklibri.it#%#//scriptlet('remove-class', 'cookie-no-scroll', 'html.cookie-no-scroll')`

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.biobiochile.cl/noticias/nacional/region-de-valparaiso/2024/02/21/auditora-denuncia-en-vivo-brutal-incompetencia-en-ayuda-tras-incendios-vivimos-en-la-indignidad.shtml](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.biobiochile.cl%2Fnoticias%2Fnacional%2Fregion-de-valparaiso%2F2024%2F02%2F21%2Fauditora-denuncia-en-vivo-brutal-incompetencia-en-ayuda-tras-incendios-vivimos-en-la-indignidad.shtml) ### Comment > When using adguard for desktop, a particular newspaper website will show a 'disable your adblocker screen'. This is achieved by loading a script, which even filtered by an adguard rule, it looks like it's being ignored > ||biobiochile.cl/assets/js/block/bbcl-annoying-block.es.js > > This behavior doesn't repeat when using the adguard Adblocker extension. In other words, the standalone extension seems to work but not when using the Adguard browser assistant. Username: `@aperez` ### [NSFW] Screenshots [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/f3ch187nmio0okw4sokcgck00kwgcokdn6hq6vwels.png?nc=1) [Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/s5vs4c3zgwgcggskc0cc8wws48sc80kodtmnvp6wlw.png?nc=1) ### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.16.0 (4542) System version: | WIndows 11 Pro 22H2 Browser: | Edge License type: | paid AdGuard driver: | WFP Stealth mode options: | Strip URLs from tracking parameters,

comment.body:
> @aperez Hello. Are antivirus and AdGuard mutually excluded from filtering each other?

Hi, Yes, Kaspersky is not filtering Adguard, actually, kaspersky doesn't have this particular rule as a filter. 
Filtering -- in this particular page, does work on Chrome (where adguard browser extension is enabled + kaspersky), however Edge, which is the default browser (and used by Adguard desktop via Adguard browser assistant) it does not.

issue.title: Как заблокировать загрузку apk - файлов, в том числе по 302-м редиректам ?

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [ ] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [ ] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

3.6.11/54

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://appbazar.am

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, EasyPrivacy, Peter Lowe's Blocklist

### Social Widgets

AdGuard Social Media filter

### Annoyances

AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard Widgets filter, Adblock Warning Removal List, Fanboy's Annoyances, I don't care about cookies

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Помогите заблокировать загрузку apk-файлов на любых сайтах, в том числе по 302-м редиректам. Пробовал по прямым линкам и по маскам блочить, но что-то не выходит каменный цветок. Файлы качаются.

p.s. На appbazar.am висит cookies-попап, который не попал в соответствующие фильтры
</details>

</details>

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
@Alex-302 , тут https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardForAndroid/issues/5229#issuecomment-1960775099 @sfionov предложил вместо 

>.apk^$important 

использовать 

>.apk^$all

т.к. первое "не работает из-за неприятного бага в CoreLibs" :/ 

>.apk^$all

действительно отрабатывает, как и задумывалось. Правда вышибает на заглушку, где всё равно можно тыкнуть "продолжить", но это уже намного лучше, чем ничего :)
